LongDescription: A heavy civilian drive designed for cargo vessels making long, direct trips.  Greatly increases thrust power and top speed while reducing turning rate.
FlavorText:
OSPN EMPEROR REVERSE
XX WRISTCOMP DIRECT-COMM XX
-- Recorded Transcription - Report edited

- CAPT N. Vance: What's going on down there? Why have we stopped moving?
- LT B. Stratis: The drive entered a shutdown state and we couldn't override it in time. Looks like Cain Heavies implemented an automatic cut-off when the charger starts to draw too much power.
- N. Vance: Is this the main drive or one of the backups?
- B. Stratis: The 9100 Long Haul. I'm looking over the auto-report right now and it seems that the MEC is designed to immediately kill the power when it detects too much drive power being diverted to the maneuver units. I think it's supposed to operate in lockstep with a Superbrain to prevent that but I also think Cain didn't account for our latest model of DARCBrains and it completely killed the RAM banks.
- N. Vance: Can you repair it?
- B. Stratis: Simple fix. We'll need to check the EIU and sensors but we've got a stack of additional units in the cargo.
- N. Vance: Get it done. Replace the RAM, do a core dump, send it off to Command Engineering. We'll drive a straight course as much as possible. Leave it to Cain to make everything difficult.
- B. Stratis: Tell me about it.
FormattedBuffs:
Top Speed: <color=#4CFF72>+20%</color>
Turn Rate: <color=#FF2525>-50%</color>
Angular Thrust: <color=#FF2525>-33%</color>
